title: Patient Feedback Questionnaire
completedHtml:
Dear patient,


Thank you very much for taking the time to complete this questionnaire.


Your views are important, valued and appreciated. This anonymous and confidential information will significantly assist in the professional development of this doctor in training.

elements.name: statement
elements.html:
All doctors in training are expected to seek feedback on a regular basis from those they work with and treat. Information from patients, relatives and friends is an important part of this process. The feedback will be reviewed and acted upon where appropriate.

The answers you give should only be about today’s consultation with the named doctor.

Please do NOT write your name on this questionnaire. You will not be identified when your answers are given back to the doctor.

elements.name: who-for
elements.title: Are you filling in this questionnaire for:

elements.name: view-point
elements.visibleIf: {who-for} anyof ['Another relative or friend', 'Your spouse or partner ', 'Your child ']
elements.html: If you are filling this in for someone else, please answer the following questions from the patient’s point of view.

elements.name: visit-reason
elements.title: Which of the following best describes the reason you saw the doctor today?
elements.description: (Please tick all the boxes that apply)

elements.name: how-good-matrix
elements.title: How good was your doctor today at each of the following?
rows: Involving you in decisions about your treatment
Providing or arranging treatment for you

elements.name: agree-matrix
elements.title: Please decide how strongly you agree or disagree with the following statements by selecting one radio button in each line.
rows: This doctor will keep information about me confidential
This doctor is honest and trustworthy

elements.name: confidence
elements.title: I am confident about this doctor’s ability to provide care.

elements.name: happiness
elements.title: I would be completely happy to see this doctor again.

elements.name: usual-doctor
elements.title: Was this visit with your usual doctor?

elements.name: optional-comments
elements.title: Please add any other comments you want to make about this doctor.
elements.description: Please note: No patients will be identified when this information is given to the doctor.
